text: irutiyaka, nam uttaravu vantu, atuppup ponkave, (nam nuhai nokki;)"uyirp piranikal ovvoru vakaiyiliruntum (an pen konta) ovvoru jotiyai (akkappalil) errik kollum; (mulkatikkappatuvarkal enru evarkalaik kurittu munpe nam) vakku erpattuvittato avarkalait tavir um kutumpattaraiyum, iman kontavarkalaiyum errikkollum" enru nam kurinom; veku corpa makkalait tavira marravarkal avarutan iman kollavillai
